original_title: Escape: Capital Cities of the World: Rome and Amsterdam
overview: Travel the globe with Liam Dale, your narrator for "Capital Cities of the World," as he guides you through two of Europe's most romantic, distinctive cities: majestic old Rome and otherworldly Amsterdam. With its enduring monuments to history and culture, Rome is a modern city with indelible links to the past, while Amsterdam's canals, museums and other cultural delights make it one of the world's most beautiful and unique destinations.
title: Escape: Capital Cities of the World: Rome and Amsterdam
